Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_nfxlfpx1aF1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/vEylORy_CCI" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><strong>pizzaoverhead</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1rPKW9o"><strong>COLLISION FX</strong></a> brings a bit more intensity to KSP’s more destructive moments by adding sparks and screeches during crash landings and the like. Future plans even call for smoke and different sound effects. </p>

<p>Want to add to your immersive KSP experience? Find out more about <strong>Collision FX</strong> <a href="http://bit.ly/1rPKW9o"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
Very interesting mod. It would be cool to see dirt and grass fly about when parts scrape across land too.
I have no desire to amplify my mistakes!
I love it! Unfortunately I'm not sure I crash enough to really justify having it. Though it probably doesn't use much RAM...
I'm sad to say, some of my experimental planes could benefit from this lightshow. More than I'd like to admit.

Cool!

I love crashing on the runway, it makes me feel so proud. Now it's even more fun!

Dats bootiful!

Is it just for the runway, or does it work anywhere?

All scraping collisions in oxygen atmospheres (otherwise you wouldn't get sparks), excluding landing gear. It's most noticeable with planes > the ground, but it will happen if a part scrapes along another part.
I now have a new aesthetic mod!!! Thanks!
